title: Optimize Neo4j Query Indexing
description: Analyze current Neo4j queries for potential indexing improvements to reduce query execution time. Efficient indexing can significantly enhance performance and decrease latency.

title: Implement Frontend Caching Layer
description: Introduce a caching layer in the frontend to store data from recent queries, reducing unnecessary requests to the server. This can drastically reduce load times and enhance user experience.

title: Introduce Self-Healing Monitoring
description: Implement a self-healing monitoring system to automatically identify and resolve potential failures or performance degradations, increasing uptime and reliability.

title: Enhance UX with Workflow Visualization
description: Develop workflow visualization tools to allow users to understand agent interactions and data flow better. This can improve user engagement and satisfaction by providing transparency.

title: Implement Detailed Feature Toggle System
description: Introduce a feature toggle system to enable or disable features seamlessly, facilitating easier testing and performance comparison.
notes: Defer until core UX/memory loops stabilize

title: Integrate Natural Language Processing Enhancements
description: Incorporate advanced NLP techniques to improve the comprehension and response quality of the agent system, which can significantly enhance the user experience.
notes: Defer until teaching + retrieval quality targets are met
